name: Mansplain Manipulate Manslaughter
description:
Escape the clutches of an anthropomorphic snake and bird and manipulate your way to freedom by returning from death! Made in a day for October 2022 UPGRADE Game Jam (with theme "Trick") using the RenPy Visual Novel Engine. 

Credits:

Faye Zhang (Programming, Writing)

Christina Qiu (Art)

Christopher Yu (Art, Sound)

Edward Zhang (Writing)
